author: Pip Hanson
description: Bittersweet, herbal and subtly nutty with delicate notes of smoky whisky. A tasty late-night sipper.
name: Oakenshield
recipeIngredient: 15 ml Cynar or other carciofo amaro
2 Saline solution 4:1 (20g sea salt to 80g water)

recipeInstructions.text: STIR all ingredients with ice and strain into ice-filled glass (preferably over a chunk of block ice)
